metadata.dc:author: Fernández-Sanz, J
Marcos, F
Galera, H
Flores, T
Armas, J R
Méndez, J A
metadata.dc:description: The authors describe a case of tumour of transitional cells in patient with a horseshoe-shaped kidney, the suspected diagnosis of which was reached with the aid of a selective cinearteriography. They stress the low incidence of the same in the literature consulted which reveals the importance of studying the patients with this malformation in an attempt to prevent complications and in particular, to make an early diagnosis of a possible malignant transformation.
metadata.dc:title: Tumor urotelial de pelvis renal sobre riñón en herradura.
[Urothelial tumor of the renal pelvis in horseshoe kidney].
